text: The Junior Eurovision Song Contest 2023 was the twenty-first edition of the Junior Eurovision Song Contest. It took place at Palais Nikaïa, Nice, France on 26 November 2023, French broadcaster France Télévisions was the host broadcaster for the event. The motto for the contest was "Heroes". == List of participating countries == 16 countries competed in the 2023 edition. Azerbaijan, Bulgaria and Russia was absent from the contest.
